sentences.sentence: The electrical activities and sequences of oesophagus, reticulum and the four compartments of rumen in sheep were recorded with polygram system RM-6008 during rest, feed, rumination and eructation .
sentences.translation: 用RM-6008型记录仪记录了绵羊在安静、进食、反刍和嗳气等状态下的食管、网胃和瘤胃的前背囊、后背盲囊、后腹盲囊、前腹囊的电活动及其先后次序。
